case.title: User can register via email on mobile app

custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Tap Sign up
custom.expected: User is able to register via email

case.title: User sees error when entering invalid email

custom.steps: 1. Open moblie app 2. Click SIgn Up
custom.expected: User sees error when enter invalid email format

case.title: User sees error when entering invalid password

custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Click Sign Up
custom.expected: User sees error when enter invalid password format

case.title: User can select role during registration

custom.steps: 1. Open the mobile app 2. Click Sign Up
custom.expected: User is able to choose role during registration process

case.title: User should sees error when value in field 'Repeat password' is diffrent than in field 'password

custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Click Sign Up 3. Fill field 'Password' 4. Fill field 'Repeat passwrd' with diffrent value
custom.expected: User sees error when value in field 'Repeat password' is diffrent than in field 'password

case.title: User should be able to register via Google account

custom.steps: 1. Go on site 2. Click SIgn Up 3. Click SIgn in via Google
custom.expected: User is able to register via Google account

case.title: User should be able to register via LinkedIn

custom.steps: 1. Open moblie app 2. Click SIgn Up 3. Clck to register via LinkedIn
custom.expected: User is able to register via LinkedIn account

case.title: User should be able to register via GitHub account

custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Click Sign Up 3. Click to register via GitHub account
custom.expected: User is able to register via GitHub account

case.title: User should be able to register after fill required fields with valid value and clicking 'Create Account' button

custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Click Sign Up 3. Fill all required field 4. Click 'Create Account' button
custom.expected: A new account is created by the user clicking the "Create Account" button

case.title: The Sign In page should have the “Sign up” link which redirects to the “Sign up” page

custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app
custom.expected: User sees an 'Sign Up' link which redirected user to Sign up page

case.title: The Sign In page should have the “Forgot the password” link which redirects to the “Forgot password” page

custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app
custom.expected: User sees 'Forgot the password' link which redirects to the 'Forgot password' page

case.title: User should be able to log in by entering valid email and password

custom.preconds: User already has an account with a registered email and password
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Enter valid Email and password 3. Click 'Sign In' button
custom.expected: User is able to logi in by entering valid data

case.title: User should see error message appears when using invalid credentials

custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Enter invalid credentials
custom.expected: User sees error when use invalid credentials

case.title: Password input is masked

custom.steps: 1. Open moblie app 2. Enter value in password field
custom.expected: Value in password field is masked

case.title: User should can create recruiter or candidate profile after registration

custom.preconds: User has completed the registration process
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Navigate to profile settings
custom.expected: User can create recruiter or candidate profile after registration

case.title: User should can switch between recruiter and candidate profiles

custom.preconds: User has both recruiter and candidate profiles created
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Navigate to profile settings
custom.expected: User can switch between recruiter and candidate profiles

case.title: User should can edit profile information

custom.preconds: User is logged in and has an existing profile
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Navigate to profile settings
custom.expected: User can edit profile information

case.title: Recruiter should can starts chat with candidate from candidates list

custom.preconds: User have an account register as a recruiter
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Navigate to candidate list
custom.expected: Recruiter is able to stars chats with candidate from candidate list

case.title: Recruiter should can starts chat with candidate from candidate profile

custom.preconds: User have an account register as a recruiter
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Go to candidate profile page
custom.expected: Recruiter is able to start chat with candidate from candidate profile page

case.title: Recruiter should cannot see candidate contacts before chat starts

custom.preconds: User is logged in as recruiter
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Navigate to candidate profile
custom.expected: Recruiter cannot see candidate contacts before chat starts

case.title: Candidate should can open contact details after chat request

custom.preconds: User is logged as a candidate Recruiter started chat with candidate
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Go to chats
custom.expected: Candidate is able open contact details after chat request

case.title: Candidate schould can declines recruiter’s chat request

custom.preconds: User logged in as a candidate Recruiter started chat with candidate
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Open chats
custom.expected: Candidate is able to declines recruiter’s chat request

case.title: Recruiter should can sends offer to candidate

custom.preconds: User logged in as a recruiter Chat between recruiter and candidate is active
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Navigate to chats 4. Open chat with a candidate
custom.expected: Recruiter is able to sends offer to candidate

case.title: Recruiter should can marks chat as rejected

custom.preconds: User logged in as a recruiter Chat between recruiter and candidate is active
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Open chats
custom.expected: Recruiter is able to marks chat as rejected

case.title: User should be able to archives chat

custom.preconds: User has at least one active chat
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Navigate to chats
custom.expected: User is able to archive chat

case.title: User should be able to marks chat as favourite

custom.preconds: User has at least one active chat
custom.steps: 1. Open mobile app 2. Log in 3. Navigate to chats
custom.expected: User is able to mark chat as a favourite
